name: The 2nd international Conference On Urban Transit & Sustainable Networks
content: UTSN 2nd Edition is about the importance of urban transit and networking system and how can it affect the environment either positively or adversely. This conference will be aimed to solve and provide technical solutions that will help the non-Eco-friendly cities to change into eco-friendly ones. Transportation is defined as a vehicle which moves people or tools to another place. The issue is how to be environment-friendly while using them.
